text.professional: Professor @ <ifpbLink>{{ifpb}}</ifpbLink> since 2014. I've made an Undergraduate in System Analysis and Development (2012), a Specialization in Software Engineer (2015), and a Master's in Software Engineer at CESAR School (2019).
text.personal: Friend. Music lover. Gamer in spare time. You can get to know me a little better from what I write on the <blogRef>blog</blogRef> or what I recommend for reading, music, movies and games through the <linkRef>links</linkRef> section of my website.

teaching.intro: I'm working as a Professor since 2014. Below you can find links to the pages of my current teaching classes and a brief teaching history. All teaching classes are hosted on <0>Google Classroom</0> and can only be accessed with an institutional email.

researching.title: Publications
researching.intro: My research interests are mainly related to Software Engineering, especially <0>Software Testing</0>, <1>Software Quality</1> and <2>Design Patterns</2>.
researching.groups: I am also a member of the <gpes>Software Engineering Research Group</gpes> (GPES, IFPB, Brazil). If you wish, see my profile on <researchGate>Research Gate</researchGate>, <scholar>Google Scholar</scholar>, <orcid>ORCID</orcid> or <lattes>Lattes</lattes> (portuguese only).
researching.list: A list of my publications can be found below, as well as BibTeX entries for citations and the link to the articles. Feel free to contact me at <email>diogo.moreira [at] ifpb.edu.br</email> if you would like to discuss any of the articles or request additional materials, I will be glad to help.

labs.intro: Here's a list of some of my personal projects and others that I've been involved in professionally. I am currently studying/practicing the following topics

links.intro: Here I gather some of what I've been reading, watching, listening to or playing. The links here generally take you to streaming sites or stores so you can buy or subscribe to a service. Feel free to report me any wrong information here. Browse the categories if you prefer, or type a term in the search box.
